item.title: [PI] Help, Money pouch Dupe
item.dc:creator: @killadragz14 killadragz14
item.description:
@killadragz14 wrote:

Ok, i need some help on fixing my money pouch.
If you add 1 gold coin to the pouch and take out -2147000000
then it will take out the gold coin but it will put max cash in the money pouch.
I want to add a string if there is a - in the value to send a return.

Here is the code, that i am using.

if (l == 713) {
               inputTaken = true;
               messagePromptRaised = true;
               amountOrNameInput = "";
               inputDialogState = 0;
               interfaceButtonAction = 557;
               aString1121 = "Enter amount";
                }

Here is the confusing part i am not sure what to add to it.

Read full topic
